seo_keywords: Deebot N8 Pro+ map not loading
Ecovacs Deebot side brush not spinning

problems.title: Side Brush Tangled / Error
problems.description: Robot stops and alerts about the side brush.
possible_causes: Hair wrapped tightly around the brush motor
solution_steps: Pop off the side brushes (color coded red/green).
Use the cleaning tool to cut hair.
If bristles are splayed, replace them.

problems.title: Not Emptying into Station
problems.description: Dust bin remains full after docking.
solution_steps: Check the two flaps on the bottom of the robot's bin.
Replace the dust bag in the station.
